comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: The Self-Master Colony was a shelter for homeless men in Union NJ, opened 1908 in the Hoyt family mansion.  The building is now apparently used by the Girl Scouts.

comment.author: 25962689@N06
comment._content: O desencanto do ser humano diante da vida...não precisava ser assim!
